MemoryInfobox.name: Spy Hunt
MemoryInfobox.description: 'Some hunters in the wilderness were disinterested in the Peloponnesian War|war, thinking it a matter of the city-states until spies and scouts invaded their hunting grounds.'

General_Description: '''Spy Hunt''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Spies were stalking through the fields of a huntress, who decided to get rid of them.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra noticed a job posted on a [[message board]]. *'''Note:'''
''Spies are creeping though my fields. Work for [[Mercenary|mercenaries]] willing to get their hands dirty.'' She sought out the huntress and addressed her. *'''Kassandra:''' ''I've been looking for you... I saw your message. What's happened?'' *'''Woman:''' ''Spies from the city have been creeping through the fields and delivering supplies. I think they're planning where to set up camp.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''The [[Peloponnesian War|war]]'s not to your liking?'' *'''Woman:''' ''When is there not war? In the city they care for war. I just want to eat. There's plenty of places they can fight without trampling my hunting grounds. I need to see those supply-running spies.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''You need me to destroy the military supplies?'' *'''Woman:''' ''I knew I asked the right person.'' (Accept - I'll destroy them.) *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm the one for the job.'' *'''Woman:''' ''Good. Get it done soon.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll be back when everything's taken care of.'' Kassandra left the woman and did as she'd asked before returning to her. (Missing dialogue.)
Section_Outcome: Kassandra aided a huntress, and was rewarded for this.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
